attributes.action: Put a stop to the opening of the proposed Madani Muslim Academy.
attributes.additional_details: On lake road in Portsmouth Hampshire there is a plan in action to renovate the old social services building and change it into the so called Madani Muslim Academy there is already a 12 foot security fence around the building which is situated near a local junior school & nursery also a church and residential housing no one has been notified of this, if you enquire into what will be studied im sure you will also feel that the Madani academy is unwelcome in this close community of portsmouth familys churches nurserys and primary schools.

rejection.details: One for the local council, maybe your MP?
